snippet: Luminaries from the worlds of art and fashion trekked out to Williamsburg, Brooklyn, for a seated dinner at the Domino Sugar Factory to celebrate the artist’s new work.
abstract: Luminaries from the worlds of art and fashion trekked out to Williamsburg, Brooklyn, for a seated dinner at the Domino Sugar Factory to celebrate the artist’s new work.

headline.main: A Sweet Celebration of Kara Walker's Giant Sugar Sculpture
